content.question: Which of the following is an accurate statement about population in 2016 according to the table?

choices.label: Nigeria had the largest population of all the countries listed.
Russia is the only country listed that had a shrinking population.
In China the number of births was lower than the number of deaths.
The population of the United Kingdom grew at the slowest rate.

content.answer: Russia is the only country listed that had a shrinking population.
